name: jResponsoSlider
body:
# Yep it's another slider *** But it's a responsive! And features touch events! Yaaaaay! And it doesn't _really_ slide, if you want to get technical. ### Markup Required ```html
``` ### Usage ```javascript $('.jrs-slider').jResponsoSlider(); ``` That's just about it!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
